td.content:
Bayer Chewable Low Dose Aspirin 81 mg tablet
Chew 1 tablet every day by oral route.

calcium carb,calcium gluconate 250 mg-vit D2 2.5 mcg (100 unit) tablet
Take by oral route.

Humalog Junior KwikPen (U-100) 100 unit/mL subcutaneous half-unit pen
Inject by subcutaneous route.

hydrocodone 7.5 mg-acetaminophen 325 mg tablet
Take 1 tablet every 6 hours by oral route as needed.

ipratropium 0.5 mg-albuterol 2.5 mg/2.5 mL solution for nebulization
Inhale by inhalation route.

mupirocin 2 % topical ointment
APPLY A SMALL AMOUNT TO EACH NOSTRIL ONCE IN THE MORNING AND ONCE IN THE EVENING STARTING 5 DAYS PRIOR TO SURGERY

substanceAdministration.text: Chew 1 tablet every day by oral route.
